name: Ultimate Basketball Stars! HD Lite - Real Basketball Simulator
name_original: Ultimate Basketball Stars! HD Lite - Real Basketball Simulator
description:
The world’s best Basketball game on mobile. Dribble, shoot, score, WIN! Grab the ball and take on the world with Ultimate Basketball Stars! Show your skills, moves and fakes to juke out your opponent and shoot for the basket! On defense, stay in the face of the attacker, steal the ball, and time your leaps to block their shots! Download Now! Free to play!

KEY FEATURES
Realistic 3D graphics: Basketball on mobile has never looked this good
Score regular 3-pointers and 2-pointers
Steal the ball from your opponent
Easy to pick-up, challenging to master
Dribble, feint, shoot, steal and block
